meanings.sent1: She pressurizes the bottle to make the ketchup come out.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic pressurizes the tires before a long journey.
meanings.sent3: He pressurizes the balloon so much, it pops with a loud bang!
meanings.sent4: The coach pressurizes the team to perform their best in the upcoming match.
meanings.sent5: The scientist pressurizes the chamber to simulate deep-sea conditions for the experiment.

meanings.sent1: The pump pressurizes the water tank for the shower.
meanings.sent2: The faulty valve pressurizes the entire system, causing leaks.
meanings.sent3: The prankster pressurizes the soda can before handing it to his friend.
meanings.sent4: The sudden influx of orders pressurizes the small business owner to expand.
meanings.sent5: The faulty seal pressurizes the engine, leading to a breakdown on the highway.
